Job Description: Job Description            Nokia intends to occupy the leadership position in vRAN / ORAN. The recent importance of remote working will accelerate adoption of 5G and cloud based technologies. Towards this, we look forward to take on board motivated professionals for the development of the cloud based 5G product, the Fronthaul Gateway (FHGW). We have a rich and exciting roadmap for FHGW                Job Responsibilities & Competencies           Design & Development of the FHGW.           Qualifications             Mandatory skills          BE / B Tech / M Tech in COmputer Science / Electronics
